entry.summary: DNS in Detail TryHackMe Easy Level Machine Learn how DNS works and how it helps you access internet services. What is DNS? What is DNS? DNS (Domain Name System) provides a simple way for us to communicate with devices on the internet without remembering complex numbers. entry.title: How to hide files inside audio or music file using hiddenwave

entry.summary: Have you ever wished to hide your secret files like Mr. Robot do, inside of an audio file. I Don’t Know about you but I was facinated by this tricks. It’s seems like magic. So, for hiding our files inside any audio file, I’ve Created a tool called Hiddenwave. you can find it here What is Hiddenwave ?? entry.summary: HTTP In Detail TryHackMe Easy Level Machine Learn about how you request content from a web server using the HTTP protocol What is HTTP(S)? What is HTTP? (HyperText Transfer Protocol) HTTP is what’s used whenever you view a website, developed by Tim Berners-Lee and his team between 1989-1991. HTTP is the set of rules used for communicating with web servers for the transmitting of webpage ...
